items.sentence: Tom lives farther from school than Mary, but closer than John does.
I want you to take the medication that the doctor told you to take.
I want to know what to do with all the stuff that you left with me.
Their team doesn't have a ghost of a chance of winning this season.
When we were younger, Tom and I traveled around the world together.
Unable to accomplish the task by himself, he turned to me for help.
If the book had been more interesting, I'd have read it to the end.
Tom knew Mary wasn't from Boston even though she said that she was.
Tom knew that Mary had told everyone that she was going to do that.
I know I've met that guy over there, but I don't remember his name.
